extendedInfo.description: Search for applications according to a detail in the Android Market.Find what you're looking for quickly and efficiently.The more detailed search of application that exists for the official Android Market.Now find the app you want is easier than ever!Also you can find us easily the developers your favorite apps just a click away.

reviews.comment: This used to be a fanfastic app,.but now I\'m not even able to find the obvious. Grrrr!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neato
reviews.comment: Awesome. Had no idea how much I was missing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needed this desperately!
reviews.comment: Thank u 4 making this app...It not only helps users find apps better, but also devs whose apps r missing from search results (re: recent mkt changes)!
reviews.author: A Google User
